strapiPost.title: TheatreSquared Internationally Recognized
strapiPost.content:
Northwest Arkansas TheatreSquared was globally recognized for its excellence in architecture and urbanism. 

  • Prestige: TheatreSquared won the 2021 International Architecture Award in the Museums and Cultural Buildings category, making it one of the most distinguished buildings in the world. 
  • Spaces: The TheatreSquared building is a $31m, 50k sq/ft facility that provides education and community spaces, rehearsal and meeting areas, outdoor gathering spaces, a one of our favorite cafes.

Keep up with shows and events at TheatreSquared HERE.
